GSP33mndvivpu:3: parīkṣakāṇāṃ vibhrāntau vivādāt sā vivicyate // MVibhr_1 //
GSP33mndvivpu:5: arthaḥ prakāśate 'to dhīs tadākāreti kecana // MVibhr_2 //
GSP33mndvivpu:6: asaṃbhavi ca yāvac ca tāvat saṃparihīyatām /
GSP33mndvivpu:9: na sarvabādhanaṃ yuktam iti nyāyavidaḥ sthitāḥ // MVibhr_4 //
GSP33mndvivpu:10: anyo bahir bhāsamāno nāntar arhati dhāraṇam /
GSP33mndvivpu:11: asattaiva varaṃ tasya bhrāntitvānuguṇā hi sā // MVibhr_5 //
GSP33mndvivpu:13: akalpayitvāntas tasmād asattāṃ khalv acīkḷpat // MVibhr_6 //
GSP33mndvivpu:15: asattvenaiva tatkḷptau na pramāṇavatī hi sā // MVibhr_7 //
GSP33mndvivpu:17: antarbhāve 'pi ca bahirbhāve bhrāntir na yujyate // MVibhr_8 //
GSP33mndvivpu:19: akhyātiḥ khalu tatrāpi na cākhyātir viśiṣyate // MVibhr_9 //
GSP33mndvivpu:21: ata eva yato bhrāntiḥ samyakkhyātau tathā bhavet // MVibhr_10 //
GSP33mndvivpu:23: svapne hi niradhiṣṭhāno vibhramo vītasaṃśayaḥ // MVibhr_11 //
GSP33mndvivpu:27: dṛṣṭeś cāvartamānasya na khyānaṃ vartamānavat // MVibhr_13 //
GSP33mndvivpu:29: tad api vyavahārāṅgaṃ rūpavattvena bhāsanāt // MVibhr_14 //
GSP33mndvivpu:31: prakārāntarasaṃsargo nanv asann eva bhāsate // MVibhr_15 //
GSP33mndvivpu:41: janmāntarānubhūtaṃ ca na smaryata iti sthitam // MVibhr_20 // ........ ........ /
GSP33mndvivpu:44: doṣaiḥ kṣataṃ manaḥ kāryi praṇidhānādivarjitam // MVibhr_22 //
GSP33mndvivpu:46: na kāryavaj jāgarāyām aho nayavidāṃ paraḥ // MVibhr_23 //
GSP33mndvivpu:48: atirekaś ca kāryasyety aho nyāyavivekitā // MVibhr_24 //
GSP33mndvivpu:49: adhyārope bhaved gauṇī vāhīke gomatir yathā /
GSP33mndvivpu:50: na saṃvidānuguṇyaṃ syān na vivekamatir yadi // MVibhr_25 //
GSP33mndvivpu:51: akhyātir api saṃvittiṃ naivānveti yato matiḥ /
GSP33mndvivpu:52: sāmānādhikaraṇyena rūpyam etad iti sthitā // MVibhr_26 //
GSP33mndvivpu:53: tasmād vibhrama evāyam iti yukto viniścayaḥ /
GSP33mndvivpu:54: na saṃvidanusāreṇa nimittaṃ tasya yujyate // MVibhr_27 //
GSP33mndvivpu:57: sattve na mithyā śūnyatve durnirūpaṃ prakāśanam /
GSP33mndvivpu:58: sadasatbhyām anirvācyāṃ tām avidyāṃ pracakṣate // MVibhr_29 //
GSP33mndvivpu:60: na yujyate yatra tatra vedyavastuni tatkṣateḥ // MVibhr_30 //
GSP33mndvivpu:62: anyasya tv anyathā khyātau na prapañcavyapahnavaḥ // MVibhr_31 //
GSP33mndvivpu:63: akhyātau śūnyam eva syāt prapañcaḥ kiṃnibandhanaḥ /
GSP33mndvivpu:65: asphuṭāgrahaṇe kāmam mā bhasi sphuṭam ātmanā /
GSP33mndvivpu:66: avidyamāne tv adhyasye vaiśvarūpyaṃ vṛthākṛtam // MVibhr_33 //
GSP33mndvivpu:68: anirmokṣas tathā ca syād athavānityatāpatet // MVibhr_34 //
GSP33mndvivpu:70: ākārā vyaktam ekasyā dhiyo 'satyāś cakāsati // MVibhr_35 //
GSP33mndvivpu:72: vibhrameṣu vivartatvam ato brahmavidāṃ matam // MVibhr_36 //
GSP33mndvivpu:75: na kiñcid bhāsate ceti viruddham iva dṛśyate /
GSP33mndvivpu:77: anyasyāpy anyathā khyātir ata eva na yujyate /
GSP33mndvivpu:78: anyat prakāśate cānyad grāhyam ity atidurghaṭam // MVibhr_39 //
GSP33mndvivpu:79: ālambanaṃ na hetutvamātrād akṣe 'pi tad yataḥ /
GSP33mndvivpu:81: yady ālambanarūpāc ca dhīr anyad avabhāsate /
GSP33mndvivpu:84: sāpekṣāyā api grāhyahīnā sā ced avedikā // MVibhr_42 //
GSP33mndvivpu:86: vivekāgrahaṇaṃ yasmād dhetubhāve na yujyate // MVibhr_44 //
GSP33mndvivpu:88: yatnenānupalabdheś ca tadabhāve ca niścayaḥ // MVibhr_45 //
GSP33mndvivpu:92: ekāntasattve kā bhrāntir asattve kiṃ prakāśatām /
GSP33mndvivpu:93: dvayānuguṇyād vṛddhānāṃ saṃmatā khyātir anyathā // MVibhr_47 //
GSP33mndvivpu:94: yatra na prathate kiñcit tatra tāvan na vibhramaḥ /
GSP33mndvivpu:95: suṣuptāv iva bhūcchāyā tamo bhāvo yathekṣyate // MVibhr_48 //
GSP33mndvivpu:96: dvayor ekasya vā khyātir asamyag vibhramo mataḥ /
GSP33mndvivpu:97: tatra keyam asamyaktā vijñānastham apāṭavam // MVibhr_49 //
GSP33mndvivpu:99: vastuno 'tatprakārasya tathā khyātis tu neṣyate // MVibhr_50 //
GSP33mndvivpu:101: sāmānyamātrakhyātir vā na bhramaś ca pratīyate // MVibhr_51 //
GSP33mndvivpu:102: na ca sarvātmanārthasya jñānaṃ kiñcana bodhakaṃ /
GSP33mndvivpu:107: pratyabhijñānavibhrāntau na smṛtitvaṃ na gamyate // MVibhr_54 //
GSP33mndvivpu:109: pratyakṣād avivekāc ca yuktaḥ pratyakṣavibhramaḥ // MVibhr_55 //
GSP33mndvivpu:111: niyatā na pravṛttiḥ syān neṣṭā cet khyātir anyathā // MVibhr_57 //
GSP33mndvivpu:112: na dṛśyādṛśyayor bhedaḥ khyātiś cen nepsitātmanaḥ /
GSP33mndvivpu:113: nanu no viparītārthā dhīḥ pratītivirodhataḥ // MVibhr_58 //
GSP33mndvivpu:115: naitan na hi pravarteta śuktikāśakale tadā // MVibhr_59 //
GSP33mndvivpu:116: rajate sā pravṛttiś cen na tasyāsaṃnidhānataḥ /
GSP33mndvivpu:122: na tatra yadi tadbuddhiḥ śuktikāśakale 'pi na /
GSP33mndvivpu:123: athāsti viparītārthā khyātir nihnūyate katham // MVibhr_63 //
GSP33mndvivpu:125: dṛṣṭaṃ tad yena rūpeṇa tat pravṛtter akāraṇam // MVibhr_64 //
GSP33mndvivpu:129: na dṛṣṭādṛṣṭayor bhedaḥ parasmin nopayoginī // MVibhr_66 //
GSP33mndvivpu:131: nādṛṣṭe 'saṃprayukte vā cākṣuṣaḥ syād viparyayaḥ // MVibhr_67 //
GSP33mndvivpu:134: anyasmāt sā svaviṣayaṃ vivinakti smṛtir na cet /
GSP33mndvivpu:135: sāmānyadṛṣṭau cānyasya smṛtau syād vā sadā bhramaḥ // MVibhr_69 //
GSP33mndvivpu:136: smarāmīti vivekān na yadi naitat prakalpate /
GSP33mndvivpu:138: smarāmīti ca vijñānaṃ smṛter anyad udāhṛtam /
GSP33mndvivpu:139: na ca mānaphalād bhinnā tat siddhyati phalād ṛte // MVibhr_71 //
GSP33mndvivpu:140: manodoṣād yadi svārtho na smṛtyā pravivicyate /
GSP33mndvivpu:141: timirādau kathaṃ svasthe svānte keśādivibhramaḥ // MVibhr_72 //
GSP33mndvivpu:143: jñānād eva hi dṛṣṭatvakalpanāyāś ca gauravāt // MVibhr_73 //
GSP33mndvivpu:145: citrādirūpān dīpādīn iti lokaḥ prabhāṣate // MVibhr_74 //
GSP33mndvivpu:147: na syād yasyāgrahe doṣavyāpāra iti niścayaḥ // MVibhr_75 //
GSP33mndvivpu:148: na ca sarvā niyogena bhrāntiḥ sādṛśyabandhanā /
GSP33mndvivpu:149: śvete pītabhramo dṛṣṭo madhure tiktavibhramaḥ // MVibhr_76 //
GSP33mndvivpu:153: dvicandrādibhramās te hi na pratyakṣe na ca smṛte // MVibhr_78 //
GSP33mndvivpu:155: anyenāpi hi rūpeṇa cakṣur nālambate 'kṣadhīḥ // MVibhr_79 //
GSP33mndvivpu:157: anyasyāpi hi naivānyas sa ity eva hi darśitam // MVibhr_80 //
GSP33mndvivpu:159: ābhāsate kathañcic ca tan nātyantaṃ na bhāsate // MVibhr_81 //
GSP33mndvivpu:161: prāmāṇyam ānapekṣyaṃ hi syād anyathā trapākaram // MVibhr_82 //
GSP33mndvivpu:165: vidann avyabhicāreṇa tāṃ vyudasyaty apaṇḍitaḥ // MVibhr_84 //
GSP33mndvivpu:167: jñānasyāvyabhicārāc ca tadbodha iti durghaṭam // MVibhr_85 //
GSP33mndvivpu:175: dūṣite vyabhicāreṇa na syāj jñāne pramāṇatā // MVibhr_89 //
GSP33mndvivpu:177: vyabhicārād asau liṅgaṃ yathā nākṣaṃ tathāpi tat // MVibhr_90 //
GSP33mndvivpu:179: dūṣitaṃ vyabhicāreṇa tat syāt saṃśayakāraṇam // MVibhr_91 //
GSP33mndvivpu:185: tathā hy avyatireko 'pi bodhād evopavarṇitaḥ // MVibhr_94 //
GSP33mndvivpu:187: asiddhe jñānasāmarthye so 'siddho dūṣakaḥ katham // MVibhr_95 //
GSP33mndvivpu:191: artho yathā jñānarūpāt tathaivety avasīyate // MVibhr_97 //
GSP33mndvivpu:193: tat satyaṃ bādhakajñānaṃ yatra tatra vihanyate // MVibhr_98 //
GSP33mndvivpu:194: anyatra tu vighātaḥ syān na sākṣān nāpi cārthataḥ /
GSP33mndvivpu:195: anumānaṃ bhavet tac ca tenāpahṛtagocaram // MVibhr_99 //
GSP33mndvivpu:196: nodeti jāgrato buddhir iti bhāṣye nidarśitam /
GSP33mndvivpu:197: vyabhicārajñānamātrāt prāmāṇyasya na naḥ kṣatiḥ // MVibhr_100 //
GSP33mndvivpu:202: dhūmādīnām api na tad varṇyate 'vyabhicārataḥ // MVibhr_103 //
GSP33mndvivpu:204: tathā hy avyabhicārāṇāṃ kutaścana nimittataḥ // MVibhr_104 //
GSP33mndvivpu:206: ekārthaniyataṃ bodhaṃ janayad vyabhicāry api // MVibhr_105 //
GSP33mndvivpu:207: pramāṇam iṣyate cakṣur nīle bhāve site bhavat /
GSP33mndvivpu:208: na cāpi vyabhicārasya sākṣāt prāmāṇyaghātitā // MVibhr_106 //
GSP33mndvivpu:211: nāstīti na pramāṇatvaṃ hetvabhāvāc ca nāsty asau /
GSP33mndvivpu:212: tadbhāvāc ca pramāṇatvam akṣāṇāṃ vyabhicāriṇām // MVibhr_108 //
GSP33mndvivpu:214: na niścite 'pi hi sthāṇāv ūrdhvatvena viśerate // MVibhr_109 // ........ ........ /
GSP33mndvivpu:216: evaṃ yatas tato naivaṃ bhaved atisubhāṣitam /
GSP33mndvivpu:218: na cet tathā nānyato 'pi tasya prāmāṇyasambhavaḥ /
GSP33mndvivpu:220: anaṅge iti moghaiva tayor atra vicāraṇā /
GSP33mndvivpu:223: hetvabhāve phalābhāvaniyamo syāt tato gate // MVibhr_114 //
GSP33mndvivpu:225: hetau phalaṃ na niyataṃ pariṇāmādyapekṣiṇi // MVibhr_115 //
GSP33mndvivpu:227: pratyakṣo 'nubhavaḥ sādhyo na hetor vyabhicāriṇaḥ // MVibhr_116 //
GSP33mndvivpu:231: kāryātireko jaṭhare vahnau dṛṣṭaś ca bhasmake // MVibhr_118 //
GSP33mndvivpu:234: abhinnaikā ca sā saṃvit kaṃ pakṣam apabadhatām /
GSP33mndvivpu:235: śūnyaṃ prakāśate ceti dvayaṃ vipratiṣedhavat // MVibhr_120 //
GSP33mndvivpu:237: sarvarūpaviveko hi śūnyam ity abhibhāṣyate // MVibhr_121 //
GSP33mndvivpu:239: abhāvo bhāvarūpeṇa bhātīti yadi manyate // MVibhr_122 //
GSP33mndvivpu:240: anyathā khyātir eveṣṭā śūnyaṃ tad api cen matam /
GSP33mndvivpu:243: nanv asti yad yathā vastu tathā khyātau na vibhramaḥ // MVibhr_124 //
GSP33mndvivpu:244: na yathāsti tathā khyātau śūnyakhyāter na mucyate /
GSP33mndvivpu:245: kecid āhuḥ prakāribhyaḥ prakārā na cakāsati // MVibhr_125 //
GSP33mndvivpu:246: viviktās te tathā bhānti te ca santa iti sthitiḥ /
GSP33mndvivpu:247: anye tanmātraśūnyatvaṃ manvate nānyathā bhramaḥ // MVibhr_126 //
GSP33mndvivpu:248: nānyathā dhīr vastuniṣṭhā vastvālambād vinā na sā /
GSP33mndvivpu:249: svayaṃ tu vārttikakṛtā samādhir iha varṇitaḥ // MVibhr_127 //
GSP33mndvivpu:251: satyaṃ yathāsti na tathā bhāsane vibhramo mataḥ // MVibhr_128 //
GSP33mndvivpu:252: na yenāsti prakāreṇa na tu tucchaḥ pratīyate /
GSP33mndvivpu:253: tathā katham abhāvyo 'sya sa hi bhāti tathā ca saḥ // MVibhr_129 //
GSP33mndvivpu:254: bhāvāntaram abhāvo hi kayācit tu vyapekṣayā /
GSP33mndvivpu:255: anyathākhyātipakṣe ca na prakārāntaraṃ na sat // MVibhr_130 //
GSP33mndvivpu:256: anyasya ca na tasyeti khyātir yuktā mṛṣā ca sā /
GSP33mndvivpu:257: prakārāntarasaṃsargo nanv asann eva bhāsate // MVibhr_131 //
GSP33mndvivpu:259: bhinnayor atra saṃsargo na kaścid avabhāsate // MVibhr_132 //
GSP33mndvivpu:264: na buddhyā bhāvaśūnyatvaṃ mṛṣā ceti vipaścitaḥ /
GSP33mndvivpu:265: na vai śaśaviṣāṇe 'pi khyātasya nirupākhyatā // MVibhr_135 //
GSP33mndvivpu:267: avastu tac ca no yena khuradharmiṇi vīkṣitam // MVibhr_136 //
GSP33mndvivpu:268: asaṃsṛṣṭasya so 'bhāva iti khyātir mṛṣā ca sā /
GSP33mndvivpu:269: aṅgulyagre hastiyūtham ity eṣā pratibhā tathā // MVibhr_137 //
GSP33mndvivpu:271: nāviśeṣaḥ khapuṣpāc ca svakāle tasya vastutā // MVibhr_138 //
GSP33mndvivpu:272: tatkālam eva hi jñeyaṃ jñānam eva tu saṃprati /
GSP33mndvivpu:273: vartamānatvam apy atra dṛṣṭam anyatra rūpyate // MVibhr_139 //
GSP33mndvivpu:277: nirupākhyād ātmayogād asvātantryāc ca cetasaḥ // MVibhr_141 //
GSP33mndvivpu:280: janmāntarānubhūtaṃ ca na smaryata iti sthitam /
GSP33mndvivpu:282: tathā hy anādau saṃsāre karmabhedān smarann api /
GSP33mndvivpu:283: anantakṛtakarmatvāt ko vidyāt kasya kiṃ phalam // MVibhr_144 //
GSP33mndvivpu:285: tasya ca jagrato 'bhāvān nodeti svapnadarśanam // MVibhr_145 //
GSP33mndvivpu:287: agrāhyam eva gṛhṇāti svayaṃ kalpayati hy ayam // MVibhr_146 //
GSP33mndvivpu:289: tad adhyārope no gauṇī tathety adhyavasāyataḥ // MVibhr_147 //
GSP33mndvivpu:291: prabhāsatām asattā tu no śūnyaṃ tad anātmakam // MVibhr_148 //
GSP33mndvivpu:295: tena yāvad bādhanīyaṃ tāvan mithyeti yujyate // MVibhr_154 //
GSP33mndvivpu:296: bhrāntijñeye ca bāhyatvaṃ bādhakair na nirasyate /
GSP33mndvivpu:299: tasmān na bāhyavastutvaṃ mṛṣā bodhān na bādhanāt // MVibhr_156 //
GSP33mndvivpu:301: sādhayaty anyathā khyātiṃ bādha eva ca naḥ sphuṭam // MVibhr_157 //
GSP33mndvivpu:302: prasañjikā hi nākhyātir asmatpakṣe tu yujyate /
GSP33mndvivpu:305: na krame yaugapadye vā vivekamatir īdṛśī // MVibhr_159 //
GSP33mndvivpu:306: avivekagrahe syāc cet satyaṃ na tu viviktayoḥ /
GSP33mndvivpu:307: agrahe prāptyabhāvena prāpteḥ pūrvaṃ tu yujyate // MVibhr_160 // ........ ........ /
GSP33mndvivpu:308: dvayor abhāvāt svapne ca viveko gamyate kayoḥ // MVibhr_161 //
GSP33mndvivpu:310: syāt sarvaivaṃvidhā bādhā paścāt dharmiṇi dharmadhīḥ // MVibhr_162 //
GSP33mndvivpu:311: tad yuktaṃ bādhakajñānād vācoyuktir iyaṃ bhavet /
GSP33mndvivpu:312: arthe 'nyathāpi saty eṣa dhiyākāraḥ pratīyate // MVibhr_163 //
GSP33mndvivpu:313: ātmakhyātau sarvam evāntar āhuḥ śūnyakhyātau śūnyam eveti kecit /
GSP33mndvivpu:314: akhyātau no tattvamithyāvibhāgas tasmād eṣāṃ vibhramāṇāṃ vivekaḥ // MVibhr_164 //
